description: My place is close to The High Line, Empire State Building, Brooklyn Bagel & Coffee Co, and Chelsea Piers Sports and Entertainment Complex. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Renovated CHIC 2 beds in the Center of the World
review: Emm's place was great. Super convenient location and very clean. She was also very easy to communicate with and quick to respond  I would definitely stay here again.
